name: Grimoire (itch) (Lucius Match)
description:
Grimoire is a very simple point&click game, where you need to decode hieroglyphics on a banner above a stone.

Each hieroglyph stands for 1 word. It may be a noun, verb or adjective.

While you are reading pages of the grimoir, you can only click arrows.

.
